sentences.sentence: Schaechter had access to no Musical Instruments except a broken harmonium found in a rubbish heap. Other than that, he had only human voices to work with.
sentences.translation: 沙克特仅有的乐器只是从垃圾堆中找来的一架簧风琴，除此而外，他便只好靠人的嗓子了。

sentences.sentence: On a trip to the English lakes one 19th-century camping party took two tonnes of kit, including a harmonium, a separate pantry tent, a crate of biscuits and a telescope.
sentences.translation: 在19世纪去英格兰众湖泊的一次旅途往往会携带两吨的装备，包括一架小风琴、一个单独的食品贮藏帐篷、一板条箱的饼干以及一架望远镜。
